title: Manchester City revenue by stream from 2008 to 2018
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing Matchday, Broadcasting, and Commercial. The y axis denotes Revenue in million euros and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Broadcasting, and Commercial are rapidly increasing, Matchday is gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Broadcasting, and Commercial has increased by 5.1, and 12.4 times respectively.
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Commercial, 2. Broadcasting, and lastly, 3. Matchday.
Throughout the period, Commercial generally had the highest Revenue in million euros relative to others with an average of 170.04, and it reached its maximum at 2017/18 with a value of 265.7.
After Commercial, Broadcasting overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 156.7, peaking at 2018.
Matchday mostly had the least Revenue in million euros with a mean value of 48.97, which peaked at 2015 with a value of 70.2.
